title: Liverpool 2-1 Lille: What Were The Main Talking Points As Arne Slot’s Side Extend On Their Champions League Romp?
description: Putting in another dominant European display on Tuesday night, Liverpool extended on their 100% Champions League record as they claimed a 2-1 win against Lille.
